properties.description: Objectspace is a public art gallery in Auckland, New Zealand. It opened in 2004 and is dedicated to the fields of craft, applied arts and design.
properties.name: Objectspace

properties.description:
Papakura Art Gallery is located in a refurbished fire station on Averill Street in Papakura's CBD.

Papakura Art Gallery hosts a diverse programme of quality contemporary art exhibitions featuring a range of art forms by local, national and international artists - both emerging and established. The focus of the gallery is to support the enrichment of local culture and community development. Through projects and events connected to exhibitions the gallery's communities are exposed to creative practice through direct engagement. Programmes also offer opportunities to emerging curators and aim to foster sustainable partnerships with arts organisations such as Tautai Contemporary Pacific Arts Trust and tertiary establishments.
properties.name: Papakura Art Gallery

properties.description:
Fresh Gallery Ōtara is a unique art gallery in Auckland that reflects the diverse communities, cultures and people of Ōtara and south Auckland.

The gallery hosts exhibitions by local, national and international artists, talks, and workshop opportunities for the public to learn and create in a supportive and innovative environment.

Fresh Gallery Ōtara is committed to developing and showcasing Pasifika arts and artists - often acting as a springboard for local emerging talent.

It is an Auckland Council arts facility, supported by the Ōtara-Papatoetoe Local Board.
properties.name: Fresh Gallery Ōtara

properties.description: Māngere Arts Centre - Ngā Tohu o Uenuku is an Auckland Council-owned and operated arts venue in the suburb of Māngere, in Auckland, New Zealand. The purpose-built facility was opened in 2010, and is considered by Auckland Council to be the home of Māori and Pacific visual art and performing arts in Auckland.
properties.address: Corner Bader Drive and, Orly Avenue, Māngere, Auckland 2022
properties.name: Māngere Arts Centre

properties.description: Auckland Art Gallery Toi o Tāmaki is the principal public gallery in Auckland, New Zealand. It has the most extensive collection of national and international art in New Zealand and frequently hosts travelling international exhibitions.
properties.address: Wellesley Street East, Auckland CBD, Auckland 1010
properties.name: Auckland Art Gallery

properties.description: Te Tuhi is one of Aotearoa New Zealand’s foremost contemporary art spaces and a leader in supporting experimental practice. We are committed to contemporary art that is locally engaged, regionally responsive and internationally ambitious.
properties.name: Te Tuhi Centre for Art

properties.description:
Northart is located in Norman King Square, opposite Northcote Library and beneath Hearts & Minds. 

Admission to the gallery is free.  We are disability friendly and all of our spaces are wheelchair accessible. 

There is free parking all around the gallery in the Northcote shopping centre.
properties.name: NorthArt

properties.description: Te Uru Waitākere Contemporary Gallery is a contemporary art gallery located in Titirangi, Auckland. The gallery, which serves the West Auckland region, was originally opened within Lopdell House in 1986.
properties.name: Te Uru Waitakere Contemporary Art Gallery

properties.description: Gus Fisher Gallery is a contemporary art gallery owned and operated by The University of Auckland in Auckland, New Zealand. It is located in the Kenneth Myers Centre, a historic building restored in 2000 with the help of the gallery's patron, Gus Fisher.
properties.name: Gus Fisher Gallery

properties.description: Located in Tāmaki Makaurau, Aotearoa New Zealand, Tautai Contemporary Pacific Arts Trust is a charitable trust dedicated to championing Pacific arts and artists. Over almost forty years, Tautai has grown to become Aotearoa’s premiere Pacific arts organisation with a multidisciplinary focus. The Trust brings artists and the wider Tautai aiga together through a range of events and activities locally and globally. Our purpose is to grow a rich ecology of Pacific creative arts practice and provide leadership, support and unique opportunities for the Tagata Moana arts community.
properties.name: Tautai

properties.description: Artspace Aotearoa is an art gallery in Auckland, New Zealand. It is located on Karangahape Road in Newton. The gallery was founded in 1987, and focuses on contemporary New Zealand and overseas art.
properties.name: Artspace Aotearoa
